member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: connectionSettings - of one of the servers is null. or connectionSettings - of one of the servers is empty.
connectionSettings - of one of the servers is less than zero and is not .

member.name: F:PatchKit.Api.ApiConnectionServer.Port
member.summary: Port used for connection with server.

member.name: P:PatchKit.Api.ApiConnectionServer.RealPort
member.summary: Actual port used for connection with server. If is set to 0, other values are used: - when is set to false then used port is 80 - when is set to true then used port is 443 Otherwise, returns value provided by .

member.name: F:PatchKit.Api.ApiConnectionServer.UseHttps
member.summary: Set to true to use https instead of http.

member.summary: Occurs when there are problems with connection to one API server.

member.name: M:PatchKit.Api.KeysApiConnection.GetKeyInfo(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets key info. Required providing an app secret. Will find only key that matches given app_secret. This request registers itself as key usage until valid key_secret is providen with this request.
member.param: If provided and valid, will only do a blocked check.

member.name: F:PatchKit.Api.Models.Main.ResourceUrl.PartSize
member.summary: Size of single file part. If set to 0 then file is distributed within a single part (default). Part URLs can be evaluated from first part URL - second and following parts have '.INDEX' names. For instance ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0 is first part, then ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0.1 is second and ../c49fde98-a07c-11e7-8919-33f7211dd1c0.2 is third.
